titleStmt.title: A joco-serious discourse in two dialogues between a Northumberland-gentleman and his tenant, a Scotchman, both old cavaliers : with an anagram prefixt to them : being some miscellaneous essays written upon several occasions / by George Stuart.
titleStmt.author: Stuart, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Benjamin Tooke ... and John Story ...,

notesStmt.note: In verse, including music and songs.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
